flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=5>>5 more lions each month.
There will be 5*12=<<5*12=60>>60 more lions after 1 year.
There will be 100+60=<<100+60=160>>160 lions in Londolozi after 1 year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
